name: location-based-task-management
description: A location-based task management platform where users can discover and complete tasks in their local area, upload evidence, and earn points through an admin validation system.

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
